name: RIPair
description:
RIPair is a game made for the 2020 Global Game Jam.

In the game the player plays a military's mechanic who tries his best to repair cars under the pressure of time as the vehicles are in a hurry to go on missions.

When the car leaves the player hears about the mission in the newspaper and the next day continues.

Credits:

Programming - Yarden Golan & Harel Herer

Art - Guy Shpadel

Game Design - Guy Brosh

Music - Amit Katzengold

Voice Lines - Lior Dizzy
